title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 226.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 226.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) (1)

This Part shall apply to a policy that is: (i) issued by a domestic insurer and any account established under or as a result of such policy; or
(ii)
delivered or issued for delivery in this State by an authorized foreign insurer and any account established under or as a result of such policy. (b) Notwithstanding subdivision (a) of this section, with respect to a policy delivered or issued for delivery outside this State, a domestic insurer may, in lieu of the requirements of this Part, implement procedures that meet the minimum requirements of the State in which the insurer delivered or issued the policy, provided that the superintendent determines that such other requirements are no less favorable to the policyowner and beneficiary than those required by this Part. Notes

Adopted, New

York State Register February 12, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 6, eff. 2/12/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
